The wallet before you, crafted from natural carbon fiber and boasting an RFID-blocking feature, is designed for the modern man who values security and minimalism. This slim, front-pocket wallet’s structure is durable and ideal for those who prefer not to carry a bulky wallet. Its RFID-blocking capability safeguards against data theft, a necessity in today’s digital age.  However, while sleek, the wallet’s minimalist design does not cater to those who need to carry more than a few cards and some cash. The limited storage capacity is a dealbreaker if you require more from your wallet. In my experience, the two plates that squeeze tightly together ought to be thinner. My wife can not extract a single card from this wallet. I often feel like I’m performing a feat of strength to gain access to a credit card, and I’m 6’0” and 205 pounds. It shouldn’t be this hard to use a wallet. Finally, although touted as minimalist, I consider it bulky.  This wallet is a fitting companion for those seeking security and style, but its constrained capacity and Hulk-like compression will not meet everyone’s needs or tastes.

Compact and slim, it fits comfortably in a front pocket without feeling bulky. It holds up to six cards tightly, and while retrieving a card can be a bit tricky, the security is worth it, and I think it's something you get better with over time. Overall, this wallet offers excellent value, combining durability, style, and convenience for a price point considerably less than the popular alternative. One thing worth noting is that it weighs the same empty as my old leather card wallet with 6 cards in it.

First, the packaging is complicated due to the fact that the customer is required to scan a QR Code included in the package. My iPhone was unable to scan it because the QR Code is not a traditional one and includes a small graphic making the reading impossible. Furthermore, the instructions ask you to download an App called Transparency and scan again the same QR Code which I did. Again, my iPhone was not able to scan. After spending over half an hour fighting this thing, I gave up. I must mention that it is a well constructed item that comes with a repair kit, included, but to my surprise it HAS NO ATTACHMENTS to be placed on your iPhone or cellphone as a wallet and the use of an AirTag to late your wallet which is unfortunate.

I love this unigue tactical style wallet with money clip, the graphite looks adds a lot of style to it.  I have a few other of these types of wallets and this one is definitely small and easier to get the credit cards out with the indentation on the one side that allows you to push out 1 or several cards at a time.  The money clip is smaller than most and is more flexible which is easier to get your cash in and out. RFID is standard with these types of wallet.  It came in 1 day in a nice box and it is very sturdy and the band that holds together the card slot is very durable. The only downside is most of these types of RFID wallets come with another strap just in case the other breaks which I doubt.  I love this cool looking wallet and would highly recommend it!

评论概述: Nice construction, and does the job well.
评论详情: i got this for my father in law who was wanting a minimalist wallet.  It looks and feel really good, no sharp edges to potentially catch on or cause tear. The design to push the cards out works out really good that it makes getting the cards out fairly easy.  The idea of it being able to support 15 cards is absolutely absurd, it goes against the idea of a minimalist wallet, but being able to expand out to "support that many" it allows the user to separate the plates to grab the card you want.  PLUS, RFID blocking for security.  My father in law really likes this wallet and carrying a wallet in the front pocket now is easier on him.

评论概述: Good wallet but a bit small for me
类型: Color: Airtag Wallet Leather Carbon Fiber Black
评论详情: The wallet itself is great. Simple design and having the small pocket to install the airtag is the best feature. It is not a very large wallet, and when the wallet is full, it is very uncomfortable to carry in your back pocket. It does kind of fit 10 cards, but for it to be comfortable and not bursting at the seams I would say that 7 cards max can be used.

评论概述: Good credit card retention. Maybe too good.
类型: Color: Minimalist Wallet Real Carbon Fiber
评论详情: The attached spring-steel money-clip makes this wallet thicker than a metal business-card case. So if you are looking for ultra-slim, then get a wallet that doesn't bother with a money-clip. The money-clip on this WXM wallet is strong and tight. To the point of requiring substantial force in order to flex it open with your bare hand. I regard the strength of this money-clip to be beneficial.  Unlike a leather or cloth wallet, the metal money-clip allows this wallet to be retrieved by hook or magnet, if you have to fish it out of a crevice or a shallow pond.  The fit and finish of the parts is superb. Looks like quality control has been achieved. But being black, it will be easy to lose it in plain sight if it gets left on top of something that is just as black.  Cards are easily inserted by forcing a corner of a card between the 2 outside plates. Once a card is wedged past the plates by even the slightest amount, the rest of the card is easily driven home with ease. Removing just one care requires that all the cards be forced out using the thumb recess. Doing so exposes a wedge of the card stack, which can then be "fanned open" by pinching the stack between your thumb and index finger, and then bending the fan of cards, like a deck of cards, to single out the card you want, and separate it from the rest. Piece of cake.

This is a very nice slim wallet. The size is the exact size of credit cards and the band on it is very tight. It holds the cards in very securely. When I weighed this it came in at 3.1 ounces. It is heavier than my slim leather wallet, but the dimensions of this are smaller. Personally, I will not be using this wallet. Being that is weights slightly more and is not as fast to get my cards out as my leather wallet I will not be switching. But my personal preference has no bearing on the quality of this wallet. If you are into these types of wallets then I don't think you can go wrong giving this one a try.

评论概述: Okay, but not perfect for me
类型: Color: Minimalist Wallet Real Carbon Fiber
评论详情: What I like:  This appears to be very will built and made of high quality materials. It's a very simple yet effective design and is stylish looking.  I like having a money clip.  RFID blocking is a necessity if you travel, and this does that.  What I don't like:  It is NOT easy to get the cards in and out of this thing, at least not when it's brand new. The ad says you can fit up to 15 cards in here. I have seven and it's very difficult to get them in and out. Granted, they are SECURE in this thing, but not easily accessible.  The money clip is somewhat bulky...see picture. It's nice to have but sticks out a little more than I think it needs to in order to be useful.  There is no outside window or separate pocket for a drivers license or ID card that can be removed quickly and easily.  Overall, this is a decent product, and if you can get past the things that I didn't like, then you're good with this. The RFID blocking quality of this wallet is what made me decide to try it out. I actually broke my previous wallet while taking the cards out to test this one, so now it's my primary carry wallet. I would prefer to keep this as a travel wallet. When I travel outside of the US, I leave most things in the safe at the hotel, and only carry a single lower limit credit card and my passport card, plus some local cash, and this would be perfect for that. I'll upgrade my review after carrying for a while if I can get past the size of the money clip.

I've seen this style of wallet around for a while now but didn't want to pay the high prices they ask especially since I wasn't sure I'd like this type of wallet. I saw it on Vine and figured I'd give it a try. I will say that I'm not sold on this type of wallet and I'll probably stick with my old fashioned tri-fold. That being said, there is nothing wrong with this wallet and it is very well made. Nothing about this feels like a knock off. The aluminum is high quality with a cool finish on it. Under that is a carbon fiber piece that compliments the aluminum perfectly, and under that is yet another piece of aluminum. The money clip is heavy duty and has a very tight hold so that your bills won't fall out in your pocket. The section that holds the credit cards expands but keeps a tight hold on all your cards, even if there's only one in there. It did seem like the cards are in so tight that they may get damaged when inserting and removing them, but I didn't use it long enough to find out. Overall, if this type of wallet appeals to you then definitely get one because it is very well made!

I literally just open it from the box and can already tell that the band is gonna ware out soon supper hard to open, the way it’s designed is really poor. The metal edges are already wearing the band  out when I open it’s starting to fray band is cheap material. I had the rock form card holder which was almost $100 and honestly considering just going back to that. Super disappointed. And hard to open why would they design it like that? Not sure how this is getting 4-5 stars.

评论概述: Have to get used to this
类型: Color: Minimalist Wallet Real Carbon Fiber
评论详情: I’m a creature of habit and my lifelong habit has been to overstuff my wallet — to the point where I can’t find anything and everything is crumpled. I’m now trying the minimalist thing.  Flip phone goes in the right pocket.  Keys and wallet in the left.  (Only essential keys, that is, and this rigid wallet.) Necessary information cards in photos on my phone. It’s not easy. I feel naked and vulnerable without that pile of stuff in my pockets.  For the first few days, I carried both this and my leather wallet, just moving some cards over. Now I am going cold turkey.My first impressions: The cards are difficult to slide in, but that seems to be easing with use. It's difficult to find and pull a single card. I hope that too will get easier. I wish they came out in a fanfold. The corners seem a little rough. I might sand them slightly,  All told, there are definitely tradeoffs with this kind of wallet, but I think I’ll get used to it. This particular brand seems well made and is good value at thisprice point. It certainly seems durable.

类型: Color: Minimalist Wallet Real Carbon Fiber
评论详情: I requested the slim wallet and received the airtag version instead, so this review is for the airtag version.  It comes in a sort of gift box. Not fancy, but intended to look like a gift. It's nicely packaged.  It's seriously over-engineered. It comes with a cage for the airtag, a screwdriver, a whole bunch of screws, and you need to assemble the cage around the airtag and then snap the cage into the side of the wallet. The wallet has a quick release on the airtag cage so it is easy to mount and unmount.  It's also heavy. Between plastic, aluminum, carbon, and all the other bits, this thing is heavy even before you put anything in it. Add in a few cards and 10 bills of cash and it's about an inch thick. It feels nicely made though. For contrast, the wallet I usually use can hold the same and come out about 3/4" with the same stuff. Though that means using a flat card style "find my" device instead of an official airtag. Probably more significantly, that other wallet can hold maybe $1000 of 20s in the same thickness as this thing when holding $200.  It would be a great gift for a person lost their old wallet.

类型: Color: Airtag Wallet Leather Carbon Fiber Black
评论详情: I got this because I wanted to reduce the size of the wallet I carry around. Can't say it accomplishes my goal 100%. The wallet is very thick, and when I put it in my back pocket, it's a pretty substantial lump. It does hold quite a few credit cards (about 10 or so) along with my Driver's License, but all the cards stack directly on top of each other which makes it very thick. But that's not the biggest problem with the wallet. The fact that the card slots are smaller than the credit cards you put in them making it nearly impossible to get the cards back out is the problem. I've even tried inserting something thick, like a ruler, to loosen up the pockets but that doesn't work. So while the wallet condenses my cards into a smaller space, the fact that you can't get the cards out is the deal breaker for me. Maybe mine was just a defective unit, but it's still hard to believe there isn't a little more tolerance for the size of the credit cards to make it easier to get them in and out while keeping them securely snug in the wallet.  So, it's a no go for me.
